Translations.Text: Inna Oebbi: "ur saut sin ioebbiten. Neppa, d Oebbi Yiwen kan. Ihi, Nek, agwadet iyI
IneS i illan di tmurt akked igenwan. Ddin, ineS i lebda. Day a teezzbem i war Oebbi
S$uo Oebbi, ayen akw ikwen i$aten. D$a mi kwen teuza lemveooa, $uoeS ay tnedhem
Sinna, mi wen Ikkes lemveooa, arbaa segwen, atnan pcaraken i Mass nnsen
Nekoen, akka, i sen Nefka. Zhut, deqqal a ppeeoem
La qesden, i wur ssinen, amur seg wayen is iten Neozeq. S Oebbi, ar fellawen asteqsi, $ef wayen id tesnulfuyem
Gern aS d, i Oebbi, tullas. Gedha s yiS! I nitni, ayen ssarmen
Ma becceon yiwen s teqcict, ad yibrik wudem is, ad iqbeo
Ad iveooef iman is, si medden, ilmend n yir usali it id ibbwven. A p ijmaa, tamara, ne$ a p irr seddaw wakal? Ay dir wamek debbioen
I wid ur numin ara s laxert: amedya ucmit. I Oebbi: amedya aalayen mavi. Neppa d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
Oebbi, lemmer Ipqissi medden, $ef ddens nnsen, ur d Ippaoa, degs, amexluq. Maca, Iswexxio iten ar lajel ipwassnen. Ma iusa d lajel nnsen, ur t swexxioen, ur t id seqoaben, s ssaaa
Garen aS d, i Oebbi, ayen keohen. Skaddben yilsawen nnsen, mi qqaoen ar ayen ilhan, nnsen. Ay nnsen, war ccekk, d times. Ih, nitni ad zwiren
S Oebbi, ni$ Nuzen ed, i leoyus, uqbel ik. Cciian icebbee asen igiten nnsen. Assa, d bab nnsen. I nitni, aaaqeb aqeoean
Nessader ak edTazmamt, iwakken kan ad asen tbeggnev ayen i$ef mgarraden, akw i nnhaya akked ueunu i ugdud iumnen
Oebbi Isse$li d aman, seg igenni. Issader yissen akal, deffir tmeppant is. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud isellen
Ih, ameyyez, i kunwi, di lmal. Nesswa kwen s wayen illan deg ufwad nnsen, ger lfert d idamen, i$i iufan, aeidan i wid itessen
Si ppemoa n tezdayin akked tfeooant, teppawim d ayen iuuekoen, akked ooezq igerzen. Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ifehmen
Iweeea Mass ik i tzizwa: "gemt ixxamen deg durar, di ttjuo, di te$woasin
Sinna, eccemt si yal ppemoa. Ddumt s wannuz, iberdan n Mass nnkwent. Iteffe$ ed seg iaabbav nnsent ayen tessen, n yal ini, degs eellu i imdanen". Deg waya, s tidep, assekni i ugdud ipxemmimen
Ixelq ikwen Oebbi, sinna, ad awen Iddem ooue. Kra, segwen, ad ccerfeffen mavi, alamma ur ppissinen acemma mbaad ma ssnen. Ih, Oebbi d Amusnaw, d Aeernuk
Oebbi Ismenyaf ad I$it kra i wiyav. Wid Ismenyaf, ur ilaq ara ad rren, ooeeq nnsen, i waklan nnsen, d$a ad aadlen yidsen. Day ara nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Iga yawen Oebbi, seg iman nnwen, tilawin nnwen. Ifka yawen, si tlawin nnwen, arraw d warraw n warraw. Ioeeq ikwen s wayen ilhan. Day ad amnen di tkerkas, ad nekoen l$it n Oebbi
Aabden, war Oebbi, wid ur nesai acemma, swayes ara ten oeeqen, si tmurt akked igenwan, u ur zmiren
Ur d ppawit imedyaten i Oebbi. Ih, Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem
